alert.note: Alert for Bee; La Salle; Live Oak; McMullen; Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued January 07 at 3:58AM CST until January 09 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS EXPECTED MONDAY... .A cold front will move across South Texas Monday. As a result, strong to very strong northwest winds and low relative humidity values are expected to develop, and result in Critical fire weather conditions. These conditions are expected to begin Monday afternoon and persist through Tuesday afternoon. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY... * AFFECTED AREA...La Salle, McMullen, Live Oak, Bee and Webb. * TIMING...Monday afternoon through Tuesday afternoon. * WINDS...Northwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 15 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Up to 79. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Bee; La Salle; Live Oak; McMullen; Webb
